channel.title: Learn Mandarin in Mandarin with Huimin
channel.description:
大家好，我是惠敏。我是一個來自台灣的中文老師，我從2004年開始教中文，目前已經教了17年。我希望能透過簡單易懂的中文，跟大家分享我在生活中好玩的事情，一些想法，新聞，電影，還有學習語言的經驗和方法，希望你們的中文也會一起進步喔。

Hi, I am Huimin, a Mandarin instructor from Taiwan. I've been teaching Mandarin since 2004. I would like to share some thoughts, insights, things that I enjoy, like movies and books, and also my experiences of learning and teaching languages.
Meanwhile, I hope your Mandarin will be improved while following my podcast.

Powered by Firstory Hosting

item.title: #104. 泰国除了榴槤以外什么最多? What is the most popular thing in Thailand besides durian? (Level B2-C1)
item.description:

2.大洗牌，Dà xǐ pái，Big reshuffle

    28.军政府，jūn zhèngfǔ，military junta (military government)
    29.军队，jūnduì，army (army)
    30.人民，rénmín，people (people)
    31.总理，zǒnglǐ，Prime Minister (prime minister)
    32.国会，guóhuì，congress (parliament)
    33.政变，zhèngbiàn，coup (coup)
    34.民主党，mínzhǔ dǎng，Democratic Party (democratic party)
    35.为泰党，wèi tài dǎng ，Pheu Thai Party (for the party)
    36.前进党，qiánjìn dǎng ，Kadima Party (advanced party)
    37.共同点，gòngtóng diǎn，common ground (common point)
    38.批评，pīpíng，criticize1 (criticize)
    39.定义模煳，dìngyì móhú，vague definition (define mold)
    40.无限上纲，wúxiàn shàng gāng，Infinite outline (infinite outline)
    41.按照比例，ànzhào bǐlì，According to the proportion (according to the proportion)
    42.判刑，pànxíng ，Sentence, given a punishment (sentence)
    43.限制人民言论自由，xiànzhì rénmín yánlùn zìyóu，Restrict people's freedom of speech (restriction of freedom of people's speech)
    44.同志婚姻合法化，tóngzhì hūnyīn héfǎ huà，Gay marriage legalization (gay marriage legalization)

    51.平等，píngděng，equality (equality)

item.title: #103. 看牙医 Go to the dentist (Level A2-B1)

2.前一阵子Qián yī zhènzi，A while ago

1.前一阵子Qián yī zhènzi，A while ago (a while ago)
2.牙齿 yáchǐ ，teeth (teeth)
3.医保卡(中國)yībǎo kǎ (zhōngguó)，Medical Insurance Card (China) (medicare card)

5.钻牙 zuān yá，Drilling teeth (drill)
6.预约 yùyuē，reserve (reserve)
7.有效 yǒuxiào，efficient (efficient)
8.严重 yánzhòng，serious (serious)

10.柜台 guìtái ，counter (counter)
11.服务人员fúwù rényuán，service personnel (service personnel)
12.初诊单chūzhěn dān，First consultation sheet (preliminary diagnosis)
13.基本资料jīběn zīliào ，basic information (basic information)
14.拍X光pāi X guāng，Take X-ray (shoot)
15.防止辐射fángzhǐ fúshè，protect against radiation (prevent radiation)
16.度360 dù，360 degrees (spend)
17.处理 chǔlǐ ，deal with (deal with)
18.机器 jīqì，machine (machine)
19.一清二楚yī qīng'èr chǔ，clear as day (clear)
20.牙周病yá zhōu bìng，periodontal disease (periodontal disease)
21.蛀牙 zhùyá，Tooth decay (tooth decay)
22.刷牙 shuāyá，brush teeth (brush teeth)
23.用牙线yòng yá xiàn，floss (dental)
24.清干净qīng qiánjìng，clean it up (clean)
25.打麻醉dǎ mázuì，Anesthesia (anesthesia)
26.钻牙机zuān yá jī，dental drill (drilling machine)
27.痠痛 suāntòng，sore (sore)
28.把嘴巴张开bǎ zuǐbā zhāng kāi，open your mouth (open my mouth)
29.举手 jǔ shǒu，Raise your hand (hold a hand)
30.表情 biǎoqíng，expression (expression)
31.唿吸 hūxī，breathe (suck)
32.口水 kǒushuǐ，saliva (saliva)
33.助理 zhùlǐ ，assistant (assistant)
34.吸口水xīkǒushuǐ，suck saliva (water absorption)
35.流出来liú chūlái，flow out (outflow)
36.被口水噎到bèi kǒu shuǐ yē dào，Choked on saliva (delose to the saliva)
37.拔牙 báyá，extract a tooth (extract a tooth)
38.伤口 shāngkǒu，Wound (wound)
39.没有胃口méiyǒu wèikǒu，No appetite (no appetite)

(weight loss)

item.title: #102. 终于学会游泳了Finally I can swim! (Level B1-B2)
item.description:
终于学会游泳了
生詞 vocabulary
2.克服Kèfú(overcome)

12.公尺gōng chǐ (meter)

16.浅qiǎn (shallow)
17.下巴xiàbā(jaw)
18.离水面很近lí shuǐmiàn hěn jìn(close to the water)
19.呛到水qiāng dào shuǐ(choked on water)
20.专心唿吸zhuānxīn hūxī(Concentrate on breathing)

22.水道的宽度shuǐdào de kuāndù(channel width)

item.title: #99. 台湾的行人地狱 Taiwan's "living hell" for pedestrians (Level B1-B2)
item.description:
台湾的行人地狱
生詞 vocabulary
2.解除规定Jiěchú guīdìng(Lift of regulations)
3.新冠肺炎xīnguān fèiyán(COVID-19 )
4.行人地狱xíngrén dìyù (Pedestrian hell (referring to chaotic pedestrian traffic))
5.日常生活rìcháng shēng huó(Daily life)
6.过马路guò mǎlù(Crossing the road)
7.短期旅行duǎnqí lǚxíng(Short-term travel)
8.特地tèdì (Specifically)
9.行人xíngrén(Pedestrian)
10.遵守交通规则zūnshǒu jiāotōng guīzé(Obeying traffic rules)
11.数一数二shǔyīshǔ'èr(One of the best)
12.机车的密度jīchē de mìdù(Density of motorcycles)
13.超速chāosù(Speeding)
14.来不及煞车láibují shāchē(too late to brake)
15.闪躲shǎnduǒ (Dodge)
16.发生意外fāshēng yìwài(Accidents happen)
17.人行道rénxíngdào(Sidewalk)
18.车道chēdào(Lane for cars)
19.速度sùdù(Speed)
20.超过chāoguò(Overtake)
21.靠得太近kào dé tài jìn(getting too close)
22.撞到zhuàng dào(Crash into)
23.距离jùlí(Distance)
24.被迫bèi pò(Be forced to)
